bibl.title: The Koan Incorporation of Kalymnos and Statues Honouring Ptolemy and Arsinoe III.
bibl.note: W.R. PATON and E.L. HICKS, The Inscriptions of Cos (Oxford, 1891) No. 8. The inscription is to be dated to shortly after the death of Ptolemy IV who here is honoured because of his role in the Koan incorporation of Kalymnos.

bibl.title: Akten des XIII. Internationalen Kongresses für klassische Archäologie, Berlin 1988

bibl.seg: HÖGHAMMAR Kerstin, The Koan Incorporation of Kalymnos and Statues Honouring Ptolemy and Arsinoe III.
Akten des XIII. Internationalen Kongresses für klassische Archäologie, Berlin 1988 (Mainz am Rhein, 1990) pp. 496-497.

W.R. PATON and E.L. HICKS, The Inscriptions of Cos (Oxford, 1891) No. 8. The inscription is to be dated to shortly after the death of Ptolemy IV who here is honoured because of his role in the Koan incorporation of Kalymnos.
